directives.details: Add the `forge_mint_alfa.py` ritual script under `tools/forge/` in toyfoundry_ai_0, following existing Forge scaffolding patterns.
Wire the ritual into Toyfoundry automation so the manufacturing watcher can surface Alfa mint tasks and log telemetry hooks.
Run a single Alfa mint dry-run against the manufacturing pipeline to validate script correctness and produce initial telemetry.
Submit acknowledgement and manufacturing report summarising ritual deployment, dry-run outcome, and any follow-up work needed.
